title: Chocolate cake

ingredients.content: 150 g butter, unsalted, cut in pieces, plus extra for greasing
250 g dark chocolate, cut in small pieces

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 200°C. Grease a springform tin (Ø 22 cm) and set aside.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk.<b> Place egg whites and salt in mixing bowl and whisk <b>6 min/speed 3.5<b> or until stiff.
Add 20 g sugar and mix <b>20 sec/speed 3.5<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk.<b> Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place remaining 180 g sugar, egg yolks and butter in mixing bowl and mix <b>6 min/70°C/speed 4<b>.
Add dark chocolate, wait a few seconds for chocolate to soften, then mix <b>20 sec/speed 5<b>.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk.<b> Add reserved whisked egg whites and mix <b>15 sec/speed 2.5<b>. Transfer cake batter to prepared springform tin.
Bake for 10-15 minutes (200°C). Allow cake to cool for 5 minutes in tin then serve warm or cold.

hintsAndTricks: <b>Quick chocolate cake<b>: place chocolate in mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 7.<b> Add butter and melt <b>4 min/60°C/speed 2.<b> Add flour, sugar, salt and eggs and mix <b>15 sec/speed 5.<b> Transfer to prepared springform tin and bake for <b>approx. 20 minutes<b> (180°C).
If using chocolate with <b>70 % cocoa<b> or more, reduce amount to <b>200 g.<b>
The mixing method and short baking time produce a mousse-like centre. If you prefer a firm cake, bake for <b>20-25 minutes<b> (180°C).
The cake can be served warm with vanilla ice cream.
